iree_add_all_subdirs()

if(NOT "${IREE_TARGET_BACKEND_DYLIB-LLVM-AOT}" OR
   NOT "${IREE_HAL_DRIVER_DYLIB_SYNC}")
  return()
endif()

iree_cc_library(
  NAME
    module
  HDRS
    "module.h"
  SRCS
    "module.cc"
  DEPS
    iree::base
    iree::base::cc
    iree::hal
    iree::modules::hal
    iree::vm
    iree::vm::cc
  PUBLIC
)

iree_bytecode_module(
  NAME
    nod_modules_test_module
  SRC
    "nod_modules_test.mlir"
  C_IDENTIFIER
    "iree_samples_nod_modules_test_module"
  TRANSLATE_TOOL
    iree_tools_iree-translate
  FLAGS
    "-iree-mlir-to-vm-bytecode-module"
    "-iree-hal-target-backends=dylib-llvm-aot"
  PUBLIC
)

iree_cc_test(
  NAME
    nod_modules_test
  SRCS
    "nod_modules_test.cc"
  DEPS
    ::nod_modules_test_module_c
    ::module
    iree::base
    iree::base::logging
    iree::hal
    iree::hal::dylib::registration::sync
    iree::modules::hal

    iree::testing::gtest_main

    iree::vm::bytecode_module

)
